SELECT vslg.id gatewayId, va.`name` apartmentName, cau.username authUserName, va.address houseAddress, vslg.gateway gatewayCode, vslg.`status` communicationStatus, DATE_FORMAT(vslg.install_time,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') installDate, vslg.installed installState, '0' `type` FROM `volga_test`.smart_lock_gateway vslg LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.floor vf ON vslg.floor_id = vf.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vf.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON va.created_at = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vslg.is_delete != '1' OR vslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL )
AND vslg.id = '${gatewayId}'
AND va.area = '${apartmentName}'
AND cau.username = '${authUserName}'
AND va.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND va.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND va.`name` LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND vslg.gateway LIKE '%${gatewayCode}%'
AND vslg.`status` LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'

SELECT cslg.id gatewayId, ch.area apartmentName, cau.username authUserName, ch.address houseAddress, cslg.gateway gatewayCode, cslg.`status` communicationStatus, DATE_FORMAT(cslg.install_time,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') installDate, cslg.installed installState, '1' `type` FROM caspain_test.smart_lock_gateway cslg LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cslg.house_id = ch.id left join caspain_test.auth_user cau on ch.created_by_id=cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( cslg.is_delete != '1' OR cslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( ch.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL )
AND cslg.id = '${gatewayId}'
AND ch.area = '${apartmentName}'
AND cau.username = '${authUserName}'
AND ch.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND ch.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND ch.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND cslg.gateway LIKE '%${gatewayCode}%'
AND cslg.`status` LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'

SELECT cslg.id gatewayId, cslg.`status` communicationStatus, ch.area apartmentName, CONCAT( IFNULL(ch.city, ''), IFNULL(ch.district, ''), IFNULL(ch.block, ''), IFNULL(ch.address, '') ) houseAddress, cslg.install_time installDate, cslg.remark remark FROM caspain_test.smart_lock_gateway cslg LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cslg.house_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON ch.created_by_id = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( cslg.is_delete != '1' OR cslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( ch.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL ) AND cslg.id = #{id}

SELECT vslg.id gatewayId, vslg.`status` communicationStatus, va.area apartmentName, CONCAT( IFNULL(va.city, ''), IFNULL(va.district, ''), IFNULL(va.block, ''), IFNULL(va.address, '') ) houseAddress, vslg.install_time installDate, vslg.remark remark FROM `volga_test`.smart_lock_gateway vslg LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.floor vf ON vslg.floor_id = vf.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vf.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON va.created_at = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vslg.is_delete != '1' OR vslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL ) AND vslg.id = #{id}

SELECT csl.id lockId, ch.area apartmentName, ch.address houseAddress, cr.`name` roomNo, csl.serial_num serialNum, csl.`status` STATUS, CONCAT(csl.remaining_battery, '%') remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT( csl.install_time, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) installTime, csl.lock_type lockType FROM caspain_test.smart_lock csl LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room cr ON csl.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.smart_lock_gateway cslg ON cslg.id = csl.gateway_id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.house ch ON cr.house_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.room_contract crc ON crc.room_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON crc.created_by_id = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( csl.is_delete != '1' OR csl.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( ch.is_delete != '1' OR ch.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cr.is_delete != '1' OR cr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( crc.is_delete != '1' OR crc.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( cslg.is_delete != '1' OR cslg.is_delete IS NULL ) AND crc.`status` = 'active' AND cslg.id = #{id}

SELECT vsl.id lockId, va.`name` apartmentName, va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vsl.serial_num serialNum, vsl.`status` STATUS, CONCAT(vsl.remaining_battery, '%') remainingBattery, DATE_FORMAT( vsl.install_time, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s' ) installTime, vsl.lock_type lockType FROM `volga_test`.smart_lock vsl LEFT JOIN volga_test.smart_lock_gateway vslg ON vslg.id = vsl.gateway_id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room vr ON vsl.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment va ON vr.apartment_id = va.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room_contract vrc ON vrc.room_id = vr.id LEFT JOIN caspain_test.auth_user cau ON vrc.created_by = cau.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( vsl.is_delete != '1' OR vsl.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( va.is_delete != '1' OR va.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vr.is_delete != '1' OR vr.is_delete IS NULL ) AND ( vrc.is_delete != '1' OR vrc.is_delete IS NULL )v AND vrc.`status` = 'active' AND slg.id = #{id}
